nodes.text: The Dominus system was an uncharted star system in the Outer Rim Territories.
The Imperial science vessel Empirical was located in this system in 2.5 BBY, when it was plunged into the system's star by PROXY to remove any evidence of Galen Marek's continued existence.
After the Battle of Yavin, Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa Solo traveled to the system. They visited Dominus III, a terrestrial planet, but were pursued by Star Destroyers.
